BackstoryDef.title: Low G Adjuster
BackstoryDef.description: Since [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a gravity-free environment, [PAWN_pronoun] childhood was spent undergoing rehabilitation and gravity exposure treatments. Although these treatments have allowed [PAWN_pronoun] to move regularly in a normal gravity environment, [PAWN_pronoun] physical condition is still far inferior compared to other children of the same age.

BackstoryDef.title: Officer Cadet
BackstoryDef.description: Due to his outstanding performance in the Colonial Military Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained as an Officer Cadet during his childhood. [PAWN_nameDef] achieved the rank of Warrant Officer upon reaching adulthood.

BackstoryDef.title: Child Orderly
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a colonial planet full of turmoil and used [PAWN_pronoun] flexible skills as messenger on the frontline battlefields full of electromagnetic interference and hostile fire. After the war, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to return to school for an education.

BackstoryDef.title: Son of Martyrs
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were declared Missing in Action during their deployment while they were very young. Due to the Military Martyrdom Clause of the Colonial Fleet, they received a scholarship to support them through the Officer Academy Course.

BackstoryDef.title: Bastard Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born out of wedlock in the colonial fleet stationed on the planet's surface, and his biological father is unknown. Fortunately, the soldiers stationed in the camp treated [PAWN_pronoun] as one of their own, allowing [PAWN_pronoun] to have a relatively complete childhood

BackstoryDef.title: Debt Inheritor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family was unable to repay their loans and were forced to come to the rimworld with [PAWN_pronoun] parents. The harsh rimworld mercilessly took the lives of [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents. [PAWN_nameDef] also found [PAWN_pronoun]self inexplicably inheriting the family's debt.

BackstoryDef.title: Organ Dodger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] signed an organ donation contract early on, stipulating donation of healthy organs upon adulthood. But clever [PAWN_nameDef] quickly used the contract money to establish connections and joined a frontier project to escape to the rimworld and evade the donation contract.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonist Descendant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is the descendant of a colonial fleet that settled the rimworld. After the colonial fleet departed, the influence brought by megacorporations intensified [PAWN_nameDef]'s safe living costs. [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to learn how to shoot guns at an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: Dragoon Shell Refugee
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood searching for survival materials during the day, and shelted in an abandoned mobile dragoon wreck shell in the war zone until [PAWN_pronoun] body grew too large to fit inside.

BackstoryDef.title: Middle-Class Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up under excellent family conditions and received a fine education. However, talent saturation and blocked advancement paths forced [PAWN_nameDef] to seek opportunities in the distant rimworld.

BackstoryDef.title: Child of War
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a conflict zone where nationalism was rising. Due to the exceptional combat talent [PAWN_pronoun] displayed, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually became a mercenary. [PAWN_pronoun] rarely thinks about anything beyond combat.

BackstoryDef.title: Young Adventurer
BackstoryDef.description: Young [PAWN_nameDef] pursued the dream of being an adventurer, secretly participating in a frontier project to come to the rimworld without telling anyone. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly learned how cruel the reality behind [PAWN_pronoun]'s dreams truly was.

BackstoryDef.title: Automatroid Enthusiast
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thought Automatroids were cool from childhood and eagerly studied Automatroid-related knowledge despite difficult circumstances. Eventually, [PAWN_nameDef]'s performance earned an invitation letter from the academic faction.
